title: THEY'RE ACTIVELY TRYING TO TAKE GD DOWN FROM THE INSIDE! IT ALL MAKES SENSE NOW!
body:
I'VE FIGURED IT OUT!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xcs2pZfQVa0
---
We all remember that Riot's tried to kill GD a few times now, don't we?

From the apples to the pancakes to the boards move to the name change to simply "GD" to even trying to remove it completely two years ago.

And now, they seek to do it once more.

Listen good and listen well, GD.

Phane, Colonel J, Baconstr1pz?

_it's a ploy_

A ploy to tear GD down through subtle (or not-so-subtle) infiltration. 

The more permabanned players they bring back, the more toxicity they re-release into our veins, turning and churning until the very life-blood that is GD is nothing but a viscous black ooze. 

Who's next? Heal Team 6? Ezreal Wright? _PLEEP!?_ ***NORSCOUT!?***

Why, my friends. This simply won't do. Riot is once again attempting a mad dash to tear GD apart and to remove it completely. 

And I'm on to it. I figured it out.

And I won't let that happen.

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_7Brl2HGaU0/UrHpRdgqxwI/AAAAAAAAAZo/6C2fFxQNZz8/s1600/Tin+Foil+Hat.jpg

######Seriously though can we stop unbanning permabanned players? They were permabanned for a reason.
